name_localized.en: 1 King Bed ADA Room With Accessible Bathtub
name_localized.es: 1 King Bed ADA Room With Accessible Bathtub

short_description_localized.en: Relax in a 200-square-foot mobility accessible room with an ADA tub and a luxurious king bed—in an unbeatable location.
short_description_localized.es: Relax in a 200-square-foot mobility accessible room with an ADA tub and a luxurious king bed—in an unbeatable location.

description_localized.en:
Our hotel is ideally located for both business and leisure trips to Manhattan, as we are a quick taxi ride from the Javits Convention Center and a few blocks from countless NYC attractions. This 200-square-foot mobility accessible room offers an ADA tub with grab bars, king bed, and the features listed below. Max. 2 guests.

Room accessibility features include: low peephole and security latches - low thermostat controls - ADA chair upon request
description_localized.es:
